Protocols/iShowcaseDelegate.html#/c:@M@i.name: iShowcaseDismissed(_:)
Protocols/iShowcaseDelegate.html#/c:@M@i.abstract: Called when the showcase is removed from the view

Extensions/UIColor.html#/c:@CM@iShowcase.name: colorFromHexString(_:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/c:@CM@iShowcase.abstract: Parse a hex string for its ARGB components and return a UIColor instance

Classes/iShowcase/TYPE.html.name: TYPE
Classes/iShowcase/TYPE.html.abstract: Type of the highlight for the showcase

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: titleLabel
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Label to show the title of the showcase

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: detailsLabel
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Label to show the description of the showcase

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: coverColor
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Color of the background for the showcase. Default is black

Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC1.name: coverAlpha
Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC1.abstract: Alpha of the background of the showcase. Default is 0.75

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: highlightColor
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Color of the showcase highlight. Default is #1397C5

Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC4.name: type
Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC4.abstract: Type of the showcase to be created. Default is Rectangle

Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC6.name: radius
Classes/iShowcase.html#/s:9iShowcaseAAC6.abstract: Radius of the circle with iShowcase type Circle. Default radius is 25

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: hideOnTouchOutside
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Hide on tapped outside the showcase spot

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Position the views on the screen for display

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Setup showcase for the item at the given indexpath

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.name: setupShowcaseForTableView(_:withIndexOfItem:andSectionOfItem:)
Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Setup showcase for the item at the given index in the given section of the table

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Setup showcase for the Bar Button in the Navigation Bar

Classes/iShowcase.html#/c:@M@iShowcase@o.abstract: Setup showcase to highlight a particular location on the screen
